name: Escoria in Daïza
description:
This is a sample game made with Godot and its Escoria system for point-and-click adventures.

Learn how it's made with the free/libre manual
Creating point-and-click games with Escoria!

This page provides pre-made binaries so you can test the game.
Note: HTML5 export not working in Escoria yet [1].

Disclaimer: I did graphics improvements and bug fixes but the bulk of the game was made by lots of people.
